university: Six Junior High School of Semarang
description: I attended Six Junior High School of Semarang, where I built a strong academic foundation and developed my early interest in science and technology.

university: Five Senior High School of Semarang
description: I pursued my high school education at Five Senior High School of Semarang, majoring in Science. During this time, I deepened my knowledge in subjects such as physics, biology, and mathematics, while also actively participating in extracurricular activities.

Currently, I am studying Electronic Engineering at State Polytechnic of Semarang. This program has allowed me to explore various aspects of electronics, programming, and engineering design, preparing me for a career in the tech and innovation industry
